original_text: He took the carved Asherah pole he had made and put it in the temple, of which the Lord had said to David and to his son Solomon, “In this temple and in Jerusalem, which I have chosen out of all the tribes of Israel, I will put my Name forever.
korean_text: 또 자기가 만든 아로새긴 아세라 목상을 성전에 세웠더라 옛적에 여호와께서 이 성전에 대하여 다윗과 그의 아들 솔로몬에게 이르시기를 내가 이스라엘의 모든 지파 중에서 택한 이 성전과 예루살렘에 내 이름을 영원히 둘지라

sentences.original_text: He took the carved Asherah pole
and put it in the temple
of which the Lord had said
to David and to his son Solomon
In this temple and in Jerusalem
out of all the tribes of Israel
I will put my Name forever
